originInfo.publisher: Administrative Office of the United States Courts

name.namePart: United States District Court District of Nebraska

titleInfo.title: USA v. Scofield
titleInfo.subTitle: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture 18 is hereby sustained. Based upon Forfeiture Allegation of the Indictment, the parties' plea agreement, and the defendant's plea of guilty, the United States is hereby authorized to seize the $4,875.00. Defendant's interest in the $4,875.00 is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law, subject to the provisions of 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n)(1). The aforementioned forfeited property is to be held by the United States in its secure custody and control. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture pursuant to 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n), in which all interests will be addressed. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM) (AOA)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: PRELIMINARY ORDER OF FORFEITURE - The United States' Motion for Issuance of Preliminary Order of Forfeiture 18 is hereby sustained. Based upon Forfeiture Allegation of the Indictment, the parties' plea agreement, and the defendant's plea of guilty, the United States is hereby authorized to seize the $4,875.00. Defendant's interest in the $4,875.00 is hereby forfeited to the United States for disposition in accordance with the law, subject to the provisions of 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n)(1). The aforementioned forfeited property is to be held by the United States in its secure custody and control. Upon adjudication of all third-party interests, this Court will enter a Final Order of Forfeiture pursuant to 21 U.S.C. ยง 853(n), in which all interests will be addressed. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM) (AOA)

titleInfo.title: USA v. Scofield
titleInfo.subTitle: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE - Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture 24 is hereby sustained as to Donald D. Scofield (1). All right, title and interest in and to the $4,875.00 in United States currency held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The $4,875.00 in United States currency be, and the same hereby are, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Marshal for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)(AOA)

extension.courtName: United States District Court District of Nebraska
extension.docketText: FINAL ORDER OF FORFEITURE - Plaintiff's Motion for Final Order of Forfeiture 24 is hereby sustained as to Donald D. Scofield (1). All right, title and interest in and to the $4,875.00 in United States currency held by any person or entity, is hereby forever barred and foreclosed. The $4,875.00 in United States currency be, and the same hereby are, forfeited to the United States of America. The United States Marshal for the District of Nebraska is directed to dispose of said property in accordance with law. Ordered by Senior Judge Lyle E. Strom. (1 Certified copy to USM)(AOA)
